articles.description: BMW is celebrating 50 years of the M division by painting the new M3 in some classic M colors. We love them all.
articles.content: The BMW M Division is celebrating its birthday proper today on May 24 with a limited-edition BMW M3 available in the boldest and best colors of past M3s. The best, of course, is Techno Violet, origin… [+2129 chars]

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Netflix's Exploding Kittens mobile game launches at the end of May - The Verge
articles.description: Netflix’s Exploding Kittens — The Game will be available for free for Netflix subscribers on May 31st. The company also revealed that Moonlighter, Townsmen — A Kingdom Rebuilt, and Dragon Up are coming to the service.
articles.content:
Three other games will be available Tuesday
Play the new game beginning May 31st.

articles.title: Microsoft’s Power Platform can now build websites and turn images into apps - XDA Developers
articles.description: Microsoft has announced a new Power Pages tool for the Power Platform. allowing users to easily create secure websites with low-code tools.
